title: Keeping lagging every single game I play.....
body: Never had this problem before, but now whenever i play a game i reach 500ms and cant even play the game anymore. its becoming very annoying. I've tried going to command prompt and tried ipconfig /flushdns but never seems to work, please help me resolve this issue. I love league of legends and don't want to stop playing.... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Sudden lag spikes like that can be due to packet loss or other network problems.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of the problem.  It will help figure out what's wrong as well as provide troubleshooting steps specific to your case.  Let me know what you find!
